forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow this morning will taper off and give way to cloudy skies this afternoon. High -2C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of snow 100%. 7-12cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow this morning will taper off and give way to cloudy skies this afternoon. High 28F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of snow 100%. Snow accumulating 3 to 5 inches.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds this evening will give way to mainly clear skies overnight. Low near -10C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds this evening will give way to mainly clear skies overnight. Low 14F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny. High -4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny skies. High near 25F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear to partly cloudy. Low -12C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly clear early, then a few clouds later on. Low 11F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High -6C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 21F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later at night. Low -11C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. Low 11F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High -4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High 24F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low near -10C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 14F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Scattered snow flurries and snow showers before noon. Becoming partly cloudy later. High -3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Scattered snow flurries and snow showers before noon. Becoming partly cloudy later. High 26F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 30%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low -7C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 19F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of snow during the afternoon. High 1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 80%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of snow during the afternoon. High 34F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 80%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low near 0C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 32F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 6C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 42F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 4C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low near 40F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High 7C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 44F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 3C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 38F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow showers in the morning. The rain and snow will change to rain showers in the afternoon. High around 5C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow showers in the morning changing to rain showers in the afternoon. High 41F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow showers in the evening transitioning to snow showers overnight. Low 1C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%. 2-3cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow showers in the evening. Snow showers overnight. Low near 35F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%. About one inch of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow in the morning. Rain and snow will become intermittent in the afternoon. High 4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow in the morning. Rain and snow will become intermittent in the afternoon. High 39F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early mixing with snow showers late. Low around 0C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early mixing with snow showers late. Low 32F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%.
